long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Fast Bookmarks extension to save things you see on the web into your fastbmk.com account. Bookmark the web pages you want to keep. Save them all. Easily find, update or delete them afterwards. It's fast, lightweight and reliable!

BOOKMARK IT ALL
- Great to keep your bookmarks in order
- Assign tags and specify a note to the bookmark you store
- Modify bookmarks afterwards
